ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lvl 52 song
ygData.msgSnippet: does sheild of songs not stack with cantana? (still have 1 level before I can confirm for myself) ... From: Cheryl [mailto:cheryl@sol3.wow.aust.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
does sheild of songs not stack with cantana? (still have 1 level before I
can confirm for myself)

-----Original Message-----
From: Cheryl [mailto:cheryl@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2001 5:39 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lvl 52 song


given shield of songs, I find march of the wee to be completely useless.

- I actually found a use for this song. :) I was in Skyshrine with another
bard. He was on lute with Dissonance(2) Cessation (48) and Cantana (55). I
was on drum doing the 3 chants. After finding some of the mobs had high
resists to one of the chants (fire I think) I had a flip through the list of
other drum based songs and pulled out Wee. The fights were taking a bit
longer but betwee the DA and healing from Cantana (well more so the healing
from Cantana) we would end the fights at full health.

You just never know when... :)

Jacana Mourningsong
Wood Elf Minstrel
<The Pantheon> Innoruuk
